Trample
[i]Veiled Appearance[/i] – Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, each opponent loses 1 life.
[i]Sworn Knight of Sable[/i] – When Sirius, Mysterious Knight dies, return him to the battlefield face down as a mysterious creature. [i](A 2/2 with ward {2}.)[/i]
[i]Alter Ego[/i] – Whenever Sirius attacks, cloak a card from your hand.
